item.title: Stock market this week: Top gainers and losers shaping Nifty, Sensex trends

review.headline_rewrite: Stock market this week: Top gainers and losers shaping Nifty, Sensex trends
bullets: Amanta Healthcare Ltd IPO The IPO of Amanta Healthcare Ltd witnessed an impressive subscription of 82.60 times by 3rd September 2025.
The IPO was open between 1st September and 3rd September 2025, and received an overwhelming response, leading to its massive oversubscription.
Two new NFOs (New Fund Offers) have been launched: The Bandhan BSE India Sector Leaders Index Growth Direct Plan is an open-ended scheme, available
Managed by Abhishek Jain, its objective is to mirror the performance of the BSE India Sector Leaders Index by investing in its constituent securities

item.title: Russia offsets lower coal exports to Europe by shipping to China, India: US EIA

review.headline_rewrite: Russia offsets lower coal exports to Europe by shipping to China, India: US EIA
bullets: Russia’s coal exports to Europe decreased in the last five years, ending 2024 calendar year (CY), which was offset by diverting the cargoes to
While Russian cargoes of the dry fuel to Europe decline by more than half between 2020 and 2024, shipments to India more than doubled.
China alone accounted for more than half of Russia’s cumulative coal exports last year.
